#summary How to install and use Zen Coding for Sublime Text 1.2.1
=Sublime Zen=

==How to install Zen Coding for SublimeText==

  * Look in Download section for latest zip archive and download
  * Rename zip file to ZenCoding.sublime-package and double click
  * Restart Sublime.

==Support==

For more info see: http://www.sublimetext.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=2&t=580

==Known Issues==
  * xml:lang='ru' hard coded
  * No user_zen_settings dict auto mergeable for user customization

==Features==

  * As you type expansion/insertion of Zen abbreviations (ctrl+alt+enter)
  * Zen Mnemonic Panel: 2 columns, abbreviations on the left, snips on the right (f1)
  * Tab triggered expansion of Zen abbreviations CSS+HTML (abbr, tab)
